hadiths.text: Zaid narrated from Abu Az-Zubair, from Tawus, from Ibn 'Abbas that the Messenger of Allah said:"Do not give away your property on the basis of Ruqba, for whoever gives a gift on that basis, it belongs to the one to whom he gave it

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى أَبِي الزُّبَيْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From Abu Az-Zubair
